description: A metadata schema for describing a single shot

timeStamp.description: Time the shot was fired in ISO 8601 format. e.g. '2023‐08‐10T09:51:19+00:00'

preshotDescription.description: A description by the investigator of the experiment before the shot was fired.

postshotDescription.description: A description by the investigator of the experiment after the shot was fired.

campaign.description: The identifier for the campaign that this shot took place within.

referenceShot.description: Unique number identifying the reference shot used by this shot.

scenario.description: The scenario used for this shot.

heating.description: The type of heating used for this shot.

pellets.description: Whether pellets were used as part of this shot.

rmpCoil.description: Whether an RMP coil was used as port of this shot.

currentRange.description: The current range used for this shot. e.g. '7500 kA'

divertorConfig.description: The divertor configuration used for this shot. e.g. 'Super-X'

plasmaShape.description: The plasma shape used for this shot. e.g. 'Connected Double Null'

comissioner.description: The comissioner of this shot. e.g. 'UKAEA'
